column1: As of my last knowledge update in October 2021
column2: "The Rings of Power" was a highly anticipated show set in J.R.R. Tolkien's Middle-earth
column3: but details about specific characters and plot developments were limited. Annatar
column5: is a persona of Sauron who appeared in a beautiful form to deceive the Elves of Eregion into helping him craft the Rings of Power. If "The Rings of Power" includes Annatar in its second season
column6: it likely refers to a character who plays a key role in the creation of the Rings and the deception of the Elves.
